item.title: Making a presentation in xaringan
item.description:
I do not know HTML or CSS. However following xihui’s book here was farely simple. I started new rmarkdown->presentation->xaringan and started editing the template one by one.

Here are some tools that were particularly helpful.

How to see your edits in realtime

One way to preview the slides is the RStudio addin “Infinite Moon Reader”. There are a few other methods in the orginial tutorial. I found this one handy.

How to quickly convert your html xaringan presentation to pdf?

  1. Install pagedown package
  2. Use the chrome_print() function
  3. pass the html file path to chrome_print()

This will generate a .pdf file in your current directory.

pagedown::chrome_print("your/directory/path/htmlpresentation.html")

How to change font?

How to add presenter notes

Add your notes after ‘???’ after every slide. Toggle presenter mode by pressing p
